cmp: 身 (body/torso/person/life/status/pregnancy/(a measure word used for clothes) suit)

exm.mng: Di Tang Quan - "Ground-Prone Fist", "Ground Tumbling Boxing" - Martial Art
to lie down all over the place, exhausted and in disarray
(Internet slang) to get unjustly ridiculed, attacked, implicated in sth etc while just being present, abbr. for 躺著也中槍|躺着也中枪[tang3 zhe5 ye3 zhong4 qiang1]
(lit.) to get shot even when lying down, (fig.) to get unjustly ridiculed, attacked, implicated in sth etc while just being present (Internet slang), abbr. to 躺槍|躺枪[tang3 qiang1]
